item.title: Widespread internet outage reported as Amazon Web Services works on issue
item.description: Apps including Snapchat, Fortnite and Roblox were experiencing outages early on Monday.

item.title: Manhunt underway for 4 suspects after heist at Louvre in Paris
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron described Sunday's brazen theft as an "attack" on French heritage.

item.title: To hit back at the United States in trade war, China borrows from the US playbook
item.description: China has expanded its export rules on rare earths, requiring foreign firms to get approval for exporting products containing even small amounts of Ch...

item.title: WATCH: Hawaii’s Kilauea volcano spews lava in latest eruption
item.description: Mount Kilauea, a volcano that has been active in recent years, erupted again on Hawaii’s Big Island, according to the United States Geological Survey.

item.title: WATCH: Emergency responders recover bodies left under rubble in Gaza
item.description: ABC News teams filmed with emergency responders as they began to recover the bodies of Palestinians found under the rubble in Gaza.
